description_text:
Hi, I just got my peddles but there's no haptics reactors with it that I
ordered, just wondering wat happened

conversations.body_text: Hi Paul Me,  Our VAM Pro is packed separately and shipped in a separate parcel. Due to the backlog during the New Year peak season, there has been some delay in dispatching orders—sorry for the inconvenience. I can check the latest shipping status for you right away. Please share your order number (starting with “SSN”).

A shipment from order #SSN5691 is on the way

On Sat, 17 Jan 2026, 2:42 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Paul Me,       Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
